survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employees' awareness and practices regarding cybersecurity in the workplace to identify gaps and improve training programs.

questions.question_text: How often do you receive cybersecurity training at your organization?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for frequency to capture granularity.
questions.scripter_notes: Radio button selection; ensure options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How often do you receive cybersecurity training at your organization?

questions.question_text: Which of the following cybersecurity threats are you most concerned about? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-select question to gauge perceived threats.

script.question_text: Which of the following cybersecurity threats are you most concerned about? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How confident are you in identifying a phishing email?
questions.client_notes: Likert scale to measure self-reported confidence levels.
questions.scripter_notes: Radio button selection; ensure clear scale progression.

script.question_text: How confident are you in identifying a phishing email?

questions.question_text: Do you use a password manager to store and manage your passwords?
answer_options: I don't know what a password manager is
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no with an option for lack of awareness.
questions.scripter_notes: Radio button selection; include a third option for clarity.

script.question_text: Do you use a password manager to store and manage your passwords?
answer_options: I don't know what a password manager is

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your organization's cybersecurity training?
questions.scripter_notes: Text input field; allow for long-form responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your organization's cybersecurity training?

questions.question_text: How often do you update your passwords for work-related accounts?
questions.client_notes: Frequency scale to assess compliance with best practices.
questions.scripter_notes: Radio button selection; ensure options are exhaustive.

script.question_text: How often do you update your passwords for work-related accounts?

questions.question_text: Have you ever reported a suspicious email or activity to your IT department?
answer_options: I wasn't sure how to report it
questions.client_notes: Include an option for uncertainty to identify reporting barriers.
questions.scripter_notes: Radio button selection; three options for completeness.

script.question_text: Have you ever reported a suspicious email or activity to your IT department?
answer_options: I wasn't sure how to report it

questions.question_text: Which of the following devices do you use to access work-related systems or data? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-select to understand device usage patterns.
questions.scripter_notes: Checkbox selection; include 'Other' with text input.

script.question_text: Which of the following devices do you use to access work-related systems or data? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with your organization's cybersecurity policies?
questions.client_notes: Likert scale to measure policy awareness.
questions.scripter_notes: Radio button selection; ensure consistent scale.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with your organization's cybersecurity policies?

questions.question_text: What additional cybersecurity resources or support would you find helpful?
questions.scripter_notes: Text input field; allow for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What additional cybersecurity resources or support would you find helpful?
